mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.excellent_id AS "excellentId", a.keyword AS "keyword", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO excellent_keyword( id, excellent_id, keyword, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{excellentId}, #{keyword}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.keyword FROM excellent_keyword a where a.excellent_id=#{esid} and a.del_flag='0'
